title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors. Multiple selection could be enabled. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as (default) (similar to perspectives). NOTES: KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also: f. Need a width hint for the dialog. g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same? I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release. KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: The OK button is enabled even without any selection.
EB: The OK button should be disabled if no selection is made.
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06) Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to the preference page 'Workbench' -> 'File Editors'.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry.
3. Switch back to the 'Internal Editors' section, and observe that there is still no selection.
4. Press OK.
5. Verify that the selected external editor is added to the associated editors list.
